issue.title: Harness after advancing checkpoint can fail to exit state 4

content.raw:
Yeah, I studied #204 before posting this one.  That seemed to me to be more of a policy question about what would happen if we were bit by a known bug; like #98; I didn't want to upstage you request for what I think is a pure problem report.

This seems to be an issue more specific to [pull request 75](#!/osrf/srcsim/pull-requests/75/increase-simulation-step-size-to-2ms/diff) and possibly [commit f6f568d5535c23988b447f94d828bbb4c726ed53](#!/osrf/srcsim/commits/f6f568d5535c23988b447f94d828bbb4c726ed53)
